successes.title: LITELOK®: Lightweight, flexible and super secure bike lock.
successes.description: Who says bike locks need to be heavy and cumbersome to be secure? Litelok® - the worlds first light, flexible & super secure bike lock.

Pledges.description: Love and thanks - we will send you an email as a thankyou for your support
Get one of our luxury herringbone tweed wrist-strap key rings. Perfect for carrying your keys on the go without fumbling through pockets or bags.
Get one of our custom Litelok® frame bags. Perfect for carrying your Litelok® and other things on your bike.
Boa Green Early Bird Special: Be the first to get a brand new Litelok® in our Boa Green colour with two Litelok® WrapStraps and two keys.
Herringbone Early Bird Special: Be the first to get a brand new Litelok® in our Herringbone black and white colour with two Litelok® WrapStraps and two keys.
Crow Black Early Bird Special : Be the first to get a brand new Litelok® in our Crow Black colour with two Litelok® WrapStraps and two keys.
Get a brand new Litelok® in our Boa Green colour with two Litelok® WrapStraps and two keys.
Get a brand new Litelok® in our Herringbone black and white colour with two Litelok® WrapStraps and two keys.
Get a brand new Litelok® in our Crow black colour with two Litelok® WrapStraps and two keys.
Twin Litelok® in Boa Green - Multipack Special: Get two Boa Green Liteloks that can be attached together and opened with just one unique key. Four Litelok WrapStraps and four keys supplied.
Twin Litelok® in Crow Black - Multipack Special: Get two Crow Black Liteloks that can be attached together and opened with just one unique key. Four Litelok WrapStraps and four keys supplied.
Twin Litelok® in Herringbone - Multipack Special: Get two Herringbone Liteloks that can be attached together and opened with just one unique key. Four Litelok WrapStraps and four keys supplied.
